ComicInfo.Summary: Spawn is surrounded in Jason Wynns building, by hundreds of guards, and a recently armed Terry FitzGerald. Spawn is now reasurred Terry is a traitor. He curses him, and then attempts to make a darring escape. Spawn succeeds, leaving the guards clueless, and Wynn in the hospital where he is visited by the Violator. Later, Spawn attempts to speak with Wanda, but doesn't get the response he expected.
ComicInfo.Title: Set Up, Part 2
